sentences.en: CCC could improve and continue the activities of SOD, POD.
sentences.cn: CCC能有效提高和延续地榆叶片的SOD, POD酶活性.

sentences.en: Dolphins travel in groups called pods. A pod can include up to 100 dolphins.
sentences.cn: 集体行动的海豚称作一群海豚(pod),一群海豚的数目可高达一百只.

sentences.en: During GA 3 enhancing bolting, peroxidase ( POD ), catalase ( CAT ) , AMY, EST, ATP and protein contents changed correspondingly.
sentences.cn: 4.在促进甜菜抽薹过程中, POD 、 CAT 、 AMY 、 EST 、 ATP及蛋白质含量等指标都发生了相应的变化.

sentences.en: Escape Pod - This is your lifeline in the game.
sentences.cn: 逃生舱 — 在游戏中,这是你的生命线.

sentences.en: Howard and I share the first broad beans, raw, straight from the pod, the essence of green, an English summer.
sentences.cn: 英国的夏天，我和霍华德分享了第一次收获的蚕豆，直接从豆荚里剥出来的——真正的绿色。

sentences.en: In the trials of bolting reversing, POD, CAT, AMY, EST, ATP and protein contents changed correspondingly.
sentences.cn: 5.在逆转抽薹试验中, POD 、 CAT 、 AMY 、 EST 、 ATP及蛋白质含量等指标同样发生了相应的变化.

sentences.en: Meanwhile , POD activity in bulb of late cultivar was the greatest among three cultivars.
sentences.cn: 晚熟品种鳞茎POD活性呈现高于中 、 早熟品种的趋势.

sentences.en: POD is a flexible structure made of convertible elements.
sentences.cn: 酶是一种灵活的结构转换的内容.

sentences.en: POD isoenzyme of Cabbage are analyzed by using PAGE.
sentences.cn: POD同工酶凝胶电泳结果显示.

sentences.en: So, you supply the pod and the entry fee, and I supply the boy.
sentences.cn: 好, 你提供飞艇和参赛费.我提供这孩子.

sentences.en: The activity of POD and SOD decreased and increased respectively at different stages of senescence.
sentences.cn: 并且与衰老相关的过氧化物酶(POD)和超氧化物歧化酶(SOD)的活性分别得到抑制和提高.

sentences.en: The germination rate and vigour index showed distinctly positive correlation with brown intensity and POD.
sentences.cn: 同时显示,板栗种子的发芽率、活力指数与褐变度、POD呈极显著正相关.

sentences.en: The POD hardware platform layer consists of compute hardware, networking, and storage.
sentences.cn: POD硬件平台层包含计算硬件, 网络和存储.

sentences.en: They are very good friends and like peas in a pod.
sentences.cn: 他们是好朋友,就像一荚子豆(铁哥们儿).

sentences.en: Using the acknowledged signal molecule in herbage - MeJA , the phenolics, PPO and POD in P . SimoniixP . Pyramibalis c .
sentences.cn: 用在草本植物中公认的信号分子 —— MeJA 熏蒸健康合作杨植株, 其体内的酚类及PPO及POD也发生了显著变化.

sentences.en: Why ride in a pod when you've got a seat in the cockpit?
sentences.cn: 驾驶舱里明明有座为什么要呆在货舱里 呢 ?

trans.tran_cn: 荚，豆荚，（飞机的）吊舱，（航天器或船只上可与船只主体分离的）分离舱
trans.tran_en: a long narrow seed container that grows on various plants, especially  pea s  and beans
to remove the pod or shell from (peas, beans, etc)
